name: April O'Neil
description: A simple super flavorful strawberry custard.
author: BCrunk

reviews.text: Best recipe name that most don't get or think it deals with the Ninja Turtles :-)

I have been trying a lot of custard recipes lately. I came back to this again. I think it's a perfect mesh of custard and strawberry. If you want a strawberry dominant custard, this isn't it. I really like it myself. I think it's a perfect blend of strawberry and custard!
It is definitely super flavorful as described, but I found the custard completely dominated to the point where the strawberry can't be tasted at all.
